page.title: 14 Tourism
page.content: Linlithgow is on convenient road and rail links from Edinburgh or Glasgow. Tourists visit Linlithgow Palace,St. Michaels and Linlithgow Loch. The Loch has a bird sanctuary, fishing, sailing and canoeing.There is a Heritage Trail,and canal trips from the canal museum.Golf, rugby, tennis and cricket clubs welcome visitors. A night club for young people is held at the Star and Garter Hotel.The Amusement Arcade is for 18 years upward .There are a variety of souvenir shops, restaurants and cafe's. Last year 12064 tourists visited Linlithgow between April and September. One hotel and guest house offer accommodation.There is a caravan site.Limited evening entertainment. Lacks hotels.Linlithgow could advertise its many attractions more successfully.
